attributes.action: Correct Reporting of Share Trades on the London Stock Exchange
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to see a new system put in place in the financial markets regarding information reporting buys and sells in share trading.

We believe the current system works against the private investor as buys are shown as sells and vise versa according to the ask and bid price set by the market makers at the time of trading.  We believe this is wide open to manipulation and misinterprets the facts.

We would like to see a new, fair system that reports a trade in real terms leading to greater transparency on the London Stock Exchange.
